titles: The case of the auncient tenants of the late deane and chapters of Durham.
author: Shaw, John, Capt.
notes: From the text: It is therefore prayed by the petition of Capt. John Shaw, and others in behalfe of the said tenants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
